system.description: You are skilled in the arts of persuasion.
system.basicAction: You gain a +1 bonus to PERFORMIN’ when trying to charm, seduce or schmooze someone.
system.advAction: People just seem to trust you. Trouble does not apply when you try to charm, seduce, or schmooze someone—when you push your PERFORMIN’ roll, you can reroll 1s on Trouble Dice, and you ignore any Trouble rolled.
